meta.title: Operation of Laminar Air Flow Bench

sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for aseptic operations using a Laminar Air Flow bench.
sections.scope: Applicable to aseptic handling of microbiological samples in the Microbiology laboratory.
procedure: Switch ON the laminar air flow blower.
Allow the air flow to stabilize for at least 10 minutes.
Wipe the working surface with suitable disinfectant.
Arrange materials required for aseptic operation.
Carry out work within the sterile zone.
After completion, clean the work surface.
Switch OFF the blower after use.
sections.precautions: Do not block air grills. Avoid rapid movements that disturb laminar air flow.
